hindi githaye thuduswaka sanda ha ira wenuwata, ajantha ranasinha wisin arundathi tharakawa githayata ekathu kara thibe.ninda nena rathriye ahase siti arundathiya gana katha kala ech aar jothipalayan wisin, wesak mahe dosak nomathi nakathak bala geta kandagena ennata balaporoththuwen siti polowe siti arundathiyakda wiya."dolosmahe pahana wage palata eliya dunna mawayi piyayi sanassamin santhosen inna arundathi malli motada gaman biman yanna adin passe me paren oba thaniyama yanna..."me arundathi tharakawa gana amaradewayoda gayuha."tharu arundathi nethu pahan niwadura nisolmane hindina.."me miyuru giye padamalawada ajantha ranasinhayangeya.
